Description.Text: Facilities A restaurant, a café, a bar, room service, a laundry service, a hairdresser and a theatre hall are available to guests of the hotel. Wireless internet access in public areas allows travellers to stay connected. Shopping facilities are also available. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is among the standard amenities of most rooms. Many rooms feature a sea view, which further enhances the ambience. Guests can enjoy a good nights' sleep on the king-size bed. A safe and a minibar are also available. Guests will also find a tea/coffee station included as standard. An ironing set is also available for travellers' convenience. All rooms offer a telephone, a TV, a radio and an alarm clock. Among the amenities provided in the rooms are slippers and a daily paper. The bathrooms are fitted with a shower, a bathtub and a hot tub. A hairdryer and bathrobes are provided for everyday use. Sports/Entertainment A dip in the swimming pool is great for getting into the holiday spirit. The establishment offers a variety of different outdoor sports options, including tennis. For a fee, golf and fishing are also available. A wide range of sports are available, including water sports such as windsurfing, canoeing, sailing, kayaking, snorkelling and aquafit, or for a fee, diving. Sport and leisure facilities at the accommodation include a gym and yoga. Various wellness options are available at the hotel, including a spa, a sauna, a steam bath, a beauty salon and massage treatments. Entertainment options and leisure facilities include live music and a nightclub. Meals All-inclusive is bookable. The establishment offers alcohol-free drinks and alcoholic beverages.
